name: ENCASE
description:
In ENCASE, you must surround every triangle with three edges of the same color, buy you can only move the edges by pivoting them around the available hexagonal nodes.

How to Play
  • Click on the hexagonal nodes to rotate the edges around it.
  • Surround every triangle with edges of the same color to clear the level.
  • Some edges will stick to others, and will carry them when rotated.
  • You can also fuse edges together, creating edges with multiple colors.
